project.name: opencode-agent-skills
project.tagline: OpenCode AI Skills Dynamic Management Plugin
project.description: A plugin system that provides dynamic skill discovery and management capabilities for OpenCode, enabling AI Agents to load and use reusable skill libraries. Supports cross-project, cross-session skill reuse with semantic similarity-based automatic skill recommendations.

features.title: Why Choose OpenCode Agent Skills?
features.subtitle: Provides dynamic skill discovery and management capabilities for OpenCode, enabling cross-project, cross-session skill reuse.

list.title: Dynamic Skill Discovery
list.desc: Automatically discover skills from project, user, and plugin directories. Scans 6 locations and returns the first matching skill by priority.

list.title: Claude Code Compatible
list.desc: Supports existing Claude Code skills and plugin formats, reducing migration costs and reusing existing resources.

list.title: Semantic Matching
list.desc: Uses HuggingFace embedding model to calculate similarity, automatically recommending relevant skills based on user input.

list.title: Context Injection
list.desc: Skill content is injected into conversation context in XML format, AI follows skill guidance for high-quality output.

list.title: Compaction Resilience
list.desc: Automatically re-injects skill list after session compression, keeping skills persistently available in long sessions.

list.title: Script Execution Support
list.desc: Skill directories can contain executable scripts, running automation tasks in the skill directory context.
